message: I'm having a spinach and mixed green salad with baby fresh mozzarella balls, grape tomatoes, grilled chicken and cucumbers with a tomato balsamic vinaigrette. YUM. What about you?
Daily Menu hasn't come over yet... looking forward to it!
@erin_w84 Yeah, I'm going to try that.
See, what you need to do, @herbg, is develop a recipe that incorporates the sriracha into the mayo. That'd be an interesting chicken salad...too bad I can't experiment at the moment.
Chicken salad sandwich.  But @erin_w84 got sriracha on my mind...maybe I'll make something that requires it for dinner!
@blogkitten LOL, I think  @erin_w84 and I were discussing that a few weeks ago.
I'm surprised neither of you own this cookbook: http://www.amazon.com/Sriracha-Cookbook-Rooster-Sauce-Recipes/dp/1607740036
Sandwiches again for Friday... humph. Roast Beef or Tuna Salad. Tuna sounds kind of good actually... make your own sandwich just means a long line.
guotie (aka  fried dumplings) and suanlatang (hot and sour soup)
i had some fried shrimp with cheese grits and french fries
